publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7660 Tom McCabe on behalf of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body: Scottish Commission for Public Audit—That the Parliament agrees to the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body’s proposal to appoint Stewart Stevenson MSP as a member of the Scottish Commission for Public Audit.

S3M-7660 Tom McCabe on behalf of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body: Scottish Commission for Public Audit—That the Parliament agrees to the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body’s proposal to appoint Stewart Stevenson MSP as a member of the Scottish Commission for Public Audit.
